answer: The development of the BMW catalogue extends existing work in X-ray source detection by providing a systematic analysis of ROSAT-HRI public data and detecting over 19,000 sources (astro-ph/0103236).
explanation: This paper best supports the answer because it describes the development of the BMW catalogue and its application to X-ray source detection, demonstrating how it motivates and extends existing work in the field.
evidence_quote: BMW catalogue with more than 19,000 sources detected
